pr_title: Spring REST resources minor bug fixes

timeline.message: Fix the order annotation in the exception handler configurations

timeline.bodyText: Is the GetMapping builds path differently than javax.ws.rs.Path ? I would not have expected we'd need a '/' prefix for the path spec on the resource methods
timeline.author: amit-git

replies.bodyText: No, it is the same. / is probably not needed, but I think it is more explicit.
replies.author: tbak
